amendment.description: Amendment requires the Department of Transportation to make its annual report to Congress available to the public in a user-friendly format via the Internet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part B of House Report 108-456 to require the Transportation Department to make its report on how federal surface transportation funds are allocated available to the public via the Internet in a user-friendly format.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. E. B. Johnson.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
